Mount Type Drive Type Control No. Size 3 Axis ("X", "Y", "Z") Milling Equipment Applications include milling of turbine, generator, and pump casing horizontal joints, sole plates, machinery foundations, and motor bases. Capable of precise milling of surfaces flat & level, and/or drilling over large areas. Also utilized to achieve flatness and parallelism in steel mill applications. Window machining, Bottom Pad machining, Load Cell Seat machining, Feed Roll Nest Seat machining, Table Roll Pocket machining, Shear Knife Block Seat machining, and Mae West Machining.

PDM-004 Medium Size magnetic base drilling Ext. 8 Electrical Discharge Machine Applications include removal of metal using electrical pulses to disintegrate and flush material from a specified area (hole). Can be performed on broken bolts, sheared keys, etc?. These machines are specially designed for quick, precision excavation of most types of metal, in any position.
